channel.title: Development on GEOS
channel.description: Recent content in Development on GEOS

item.title: Testing
item.description: Testing executables are in bin See also the ctest documentation. Unit Tests The GEOS unit tests are written using the TUT framework. There are tests for both the C++ code and the C API. The test source files are in the test/unit directory. The test group names are in the group declaration in each XXXTest.cpp file. By convention the test group name is based on the test file path and name.

item.title: CI Status
item.description: CI main 3.10 3.9 3.8 3.7 GitHub GitLab Azure Debbie Winnie Dronie Bessie Bessie32 Berrie Berrie64 Runners GitHub - Ubuntu various, Windows various, CMake GitLab - Debian 8.
